K,a = number_field(1213372521119611584938268418626736440379881960273318931317037 + 8414544562340148366886370530566011775599181684014016725 * x + 27707799159913205439217024680990090803255106895969 * x * x + 52720413431912310540583763217520336881834941 * x * x * x + 65515810467956591159406923093871889385 * x * x * x * x + 59153826710152902123415863955429 * x * x * x * x * x + 51214286154238097816667505 * x * x * x * x * x * x + 39513134944588802637 * x * x * x * x * x * x * x + 21959542431545 * x * x * x * x * x * x * x * x + 6848437 * x * x * x * x * x * x * x * x * x + x * x * x * x * x * x * x * x * x * x);
K2 = simplify(K)[1];
writedlm("/home/gert/Projects/MultFreeCenters/Mathematica/simplerfields" * string(862) * ".txt", string(defining_polynomial(K2)));
